effect_entries.effect: Held by lead Pokémon: Prevents wild battles with Pokémon that are lower level than the holder.
effect_entries.short_effect: Prevents wild encounters of level lower than your party's lead Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
让排在最前面的宝可梦携带后，
野生宝可梦就会不容易出现。

１番　前の　ポケモンに
持たせると　野生ポケモンが
でて　きにくくなる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon. It helps keep
wild Pokémon away if the holder is the head of
the party.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Se chi ce l’ha è il primo della squadra, aiuta
ad allontanare i Pokémon selvatici.

Si lo lleva el primer Pokémon del equipo, se reduce
la probabilidad de que se acerquen Pokémon
salvajes.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Reduziert Begegnungen mit
wilden Pokémon, wenn der Träger an der Spitze
deines Teams steht.

Objet à tenir. Aide à repousser les Pokémon
sauvages si le porteur est le premier Pokémon
de l’équipe.

讓排在最前面的寶可夢
攜帶後，野生寶可夢
會變得不容易出現。

맨 앞의 포켓몬에게
지니게 하면 야생 포켓몬이
나타날 확률이 낮아진다.

いちばん　まえの　ポケモンに
もたせると　やせいポケモンが
でて　きにくくなる。

１番　前の　ポケモンに
持たせると　野生ポケモンが
でて　きにくくなる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It helps keep wild Pokémon away if
the holder is the head of the party.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Se chi ce l’ha è il primo della squadra, aiuta
ad allontanare i Pokémon selvatici.

Debe llevarlo un Pokémon. Aumenta la
concentración y fortalece los movimientos
de tipo Lucha.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Reduziert Begegnungen mit
wilden Pokémon, wenn der Träger an erster Stelle
steht.

Objet à tenir. Aide à repousser les Pokémon
sauvages si le porteur est le premier Pokémon
de l’équipe.

맨 앞의 포켓몬에게
지니게 하면 야생 포켓몬이
나타날 확률이 낮아진다.

いちばん　まえの　ポケモンに
もたせると　やせいポケモンが
でて　きにくくなる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It helps keep wild Pokémon away if the
holder is the first one in the party.

holder is the first one in the party.

Pokémon sauvages si le porteur est
le premier Pokémon de l’équipe.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It helps keep wild Pokémon away if the

An item to be held by a Pokémon.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It helps keep wild Pokémon away if the
holder is the first one in the party.

An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It repels wild POKéMON if the
holder is first in the party.

A hold item that
helps repel wild
POKéMON.
